Package game.weapons.portableweapons

Class Uchigatana

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.weapons.weapontypes.Katana
game.weapons.portableweapons.Uchigatana
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon, Purchasable, Sellable
public class Uchigatana extends Katana implements Purchasable, Sellable
A weapon that is carried by Samurai. It deals 115 damage with 80% attack accuracy. Created by:
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Che'er Min Yi, Chong Ming Sheng, Lam Xin Yuan
